title: Miley Cyrus gets visit from Cody Simpson after being hospitalised
text:
Miley Cyrus is being looked after by Cody Simpson while in hospital with tonsillitis (Picture: Instagram/Getty Images)

Miley Cyrus isn’t feeling herself so much, after falling ill with tonsillitis and she’s been sharing snaps of herself in hospital.

The Wrecking Ball singer has been admitted to treat the nasty throat infection and it seems new boyfriend Cody Simpson has been a dab handy at playing doctor.

Miley revealed that the Australian star was en route to keep her company while she stays in hospital to treat the tonsillitis and even referred to him as her ‘BF’ in her post.

She took to her Instagram story with a selfie from her hospital bed and told fans: ‘BF coming to visit me @ the hospy (sic).’

Just hours earlier, Miley had gone Instagram official with her new man and posted a picture of Cody playing doctor for her, while saying she felt the ‘luckiest’ to have him helping her on her road to recovery.

Miley revealed new boyfriend Cody was on his way (Picture: Instagram)

The star’s mum Tish has been on hand to make her feel better (Picture: Instagram)

While in hospital, Miley revealed her mum Tish has been on hand to make her feel better and she told fans she was trying to ‘heal as quick as she can’, so she can still appear at Gorillapalooza this weekend.

Gorillapalooze is a music event hosted by Ellen DeGeneres in aid of her conservation work for gorillas with her chairty The Ellen Fund.

Miley is scheduled to perform at the festival like event, with Bruno Mars headlining.

She vented her frustration at falling ill just days before and wrote: ‘Trying to heal as quick as I can to make it to Gorillapalooza… this weekend! Send gooooood vibes my way.

‘Hoping the Rock star G*DS send me a boost of bad ass and help me kick this sh*t to the curb where it belongs. We got gorillas to save!’

Miley said she wants to heal as quick as she can so she can perform at Gorillapalooza this weekend (Picture: Instagram)

Meanwhile, Miley’s whirlwind romance with Cody first surfaced just days after it was revealed she had split from ex-girlfriend Kaitlynn Carter.

Miley and Brody Jenner’s ex were first linked shortly after it was revealed Miley had separated from husband Liam Hemsworth, after just eight months of marriage.

After breaking up with her partner of 10 years, Miley was seen kissing Kaitlynn on their ‘hot girl summer’ trip to Italy in August.

The girls called it quits after just over a month of dating, with sources revealing the pair have decided they’re now better off as friends.
